title: Apple crumble
ingredients: ['1kg apples - peeled, cored and sliced', '150g caster sugar', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '125ml water', 'Crumble topping', '75g porridge oats', '125g plain flour', '225g dark brown soft sugar', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '125g butter, melted']
